Monte Cassino ..?  Maybe ..?
After  not being able to take the Monastary .. the  Bombers  were  sent  in  to  obiliterate  it .. as it  was thought  .. by destroying the Monastary -  Monte  Cassino  could  be  easily taken.  -  Mistake ..
